channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Adaptive Server Enterprise (Backup Server)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Adaptive Server Enterprise (Backup Server)

item.title: CVE-2020-6248|2024-08-04T08:55:22.251Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20adaptive%20server%20enterprise%20%28backup%20server%29
item.description: SAP Adaptive Server Enterprise (Backup Server), version 16.0, does not perform the necessary validation checks for an authenticated user while executing DUMP or LOAD command allowing arbitrary code execution or Code Injection.
